author: g1.eth
content:
Hii ! Quick question 

When an EIP (new one or updates to existing one ) gets merged to master on https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs, does that mean it's open for implementation across clients? Or do we need to wait for other signals before clients should implement?
Same question for execution-apis updates - when are those changes considered ready for client implementation?
Context: Looking to contribute meaningfully to a client(likely geth) with actual feature work rather than just small fixes/typos, so want to make sure I'm targeting the right EIPs/specs that are ready for implementation.

Thanks!
